content.en: Smart Suspension Algorithms: Researchers have been investigating how algorithms can improve the performance of vehicle suspension systems. These algorithms, such as the modified skyhook algorithm, current generator model, intelligent control scheme, and fuzzy logic control, are used as controllers in semi-active suspension systems to enhance ride comfort, handling performance, and stability. By optimizing the operations of the suspension system, these algorithms aim to reduce vibrations, improve damping control, and enhance overall vehicle performance.
content.da: Smarte suspensionsalgoritmer: Forskere har undersøgt, hvordan algoritmer kan forbedre ydeevnen af ​​køretøjers affjedringssystemer. Disse algoritmer, såsom den modificerede skyhook-algoritme, nuværende generatormodel, intelligent kontrolskema og fuzzy-logic-kontrol, bruges som controllere i semi-aktive affjedringssystemer for at forbedre kørekomfort, håndteringsevne og stabilitet. Ved at optimere driften af ​​affjedringssystemet, sigter disse algoritmer mod at reducere vibrationer, forbedre dæmpningskontrol og øge den samlede køretøjsydelse.
